kubejs.ponder.ancient_aura_generator.tex: Place leaves within a 3-block radius of the core
Leaves are absorbed by the core and converted into aura, with each leaf converting 10,000 aura
When the nearby aura exceeds a certain value, aura generation will stop
Placing a generation catalyst below the core can break this limit and produce twice the original amount of aura
kubejs.ponder.elven_portal_conversion.te: Place livingrock within a 5 block radius of an activated Elven Gateway Core
The livingrock will be transformed into the Shimmerock
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_1: Firstly, we need to build a structure
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_2: Once built, right click on the block at the bottom
kubejs.ponder.first_tree.text_3: Capsules can be obtained from the 「Capsules」 chapter for quick placement of this structure.
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_1: Once the altar is built, it will slowly absorb the surrounding aura and deposit into the natural altar
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_2: Place the item to be infused into the nature altar, if the nature altar has enough aura, the item will be infused with the aura.
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_3: Catalytic converters can be placed in these four locations
kubejs.ponder.nature_altar.text_4: After placing the catalyst, the natural altar will have more recipes
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_1: Flowers need to be placed around the Offering Table
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_2: First put in the sacrificial items
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_3: Then drop the starter item on the altar
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_4: If successful, a bolt of lightning will appear above the altar
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_5: Wait for a while and the sacrificed items will fall from the sky like rain
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_1: The Spirit Furnace requires a multiblock structure to function.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_10: If the entity in the Eternal Soul Tank is a Ghast, we need a 6x6x6 size Spirit Furnace, which means the hollow part of the structure should be 4x4.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_2: Construct a hollow structure using blood-soaked dark bricks.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_3: Place the Spirit Furnace on any side.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_4: Pipes can be connected at the Spirit Furnace.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_5: Depending on the size of the entity in the Eternal Soul Tank, we need to change the size of the Spirit Furnace.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_6: For example, if the entity in the Eternal Soul Tank is a Raider, because its height is 2 blocks, we need a 3x4x3 size Spirit Furnace, which means the hollow part of the structure should be 2 blocks.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_7: The current size is just right.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_8: If the entity in the Eternal Soul Tank is a Wither Skeleton or Enderman, because their height is 2-3 blocks, we need a 3x5x3 size Spirit Furnace, which means the hollow part of the structure should be 3 blocks.
kubejs.ponder.spirit_furnace.text_9: In this case, we need to add an extra layer.
